resources.string:
When your WiFi is on and your connection reaches the Internet a + button will happear.
By clicking on it a download of 20 Mb will start to check your download speed. It will take 4 seconds approximately.
We are now\n Ready to begin!
Click to get started!\n It will take just a few seconds
To use WeMap, connect to PoliTo wifi network. \n This version works for the Cittadella Politecnica only!
In the main page you will find all the info about the Wi-Fi network you are connected to, your device info and the connection speed
click on the (+) button to perform the internet speed test.\n Follow the instructions to specify your position
Click "Save" button to send the collected data to our server.\n The data collected by all users will be used to create a cumulative Wi-Fi heat-map
You can always check all your collected data from the menu
